title: PGIM Short Duration High Yield Fund, Inc. and PGIM Global Short Duration High Yield Fund, Inc. declare distributions for December 2018 and January and February 2019
PGIM Global Short Duration High Yield Fund, Inc. Reports Unaudited Earnings and Financial Position for Quarter Ended October 31, 2018

PGIM Short Duration High Yield Fund, Inc. and PGIM Global Short Duration High Yield Fund, Inc. announce investment policy changes, name changes and an increase in monthly distributions for March, April and May 2019
